attribute.name: onclick
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when the element is clicked.

attribute.name: ondblclick
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when the element is double-clicked.

attribute.name: onmousedown
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when the pointing device is pressed over this element.

attribute.name: onmouseup
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when the pointing device is released over this element.

attribute.name: onmouseover
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when the pointing device is moved into this element.

attribute.name: onmousemove
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when the pointing device is moved while it is in this element.

attribute.name: onmouseout
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when the pointing device is moves out of this element.

attribute.name: onkeypress
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when a key is pressed over this element.

attribute.name: onkeydown
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when a key is pressed down over this element.

attribute.name: onkeyup
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when a key is released over this element.
